nodes.text: Hydrogenated Smapp was a type of dish. For cooking, it was recommended that one used wild Smapp instead of domestic Smapp, due to the fact that the wild variety had a bogg consistency and curled naturally under any sort of radiant manipulation one employed.

Hydrogenated Smapp was mentioned in a recipe for Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
